modified_sections: Created keyboard shortcut handlers for filters

patterns_discovered: Dynamic filter toggling using functional state updates
Centralized keyboard shortcut definitions using useMemo
Toggle patterns for different filter types (assetType, dateRange, minEvidence)
gotchas_discovered: Need to handle toggle on/off for different filter types
Ensuring keyboard shortcut handlers don't conflict with other input methods
Maintaining state immutability during filter updates

implemented_features: Keyboard shortcuts for airports filter (A key)
Keyboard shortcuts for military filter (M key)
Keyboard shortcuts for date range filter (T key)
Keyboard shortcuts for evidence verification filter (V key)
Keyboard shortcuts for filter reset (R key)
Keyboard shortcuts for filter panel toggle (F key)
